casebody.data:
Roy Paul PEREZ, etc., et al., Plaintiffs-Appellees, v. FORD MOTOR COMPANY, Defendant, Traders and General Insurance Company, Intervenor-Appellant. No. 75-3490

Summary Calendar.*

United States Court of Appeals, Fifth Circuit. March 5, 1976. Ben W. Lightfoot, Baton Rouge, La., for intervenor-appellant. Harvey J. Lewis, New Orleans, La., Jack B. Wise, Thibodaux, La., for plaintiffs-appellees. Before BELL, GODBOLD and DYER, Circuit Judges.

Rule 18, 5 Cir., Isbell Enterprises, Inc. v. Citizens Casualty Company of New York et al., 5 Cir., 1970, 431 F.2d 409, Part I.

 PER CURIAM:

Affirmed on the opinion of the District Court. 408 F.Supp. 318 (1976).
